website_summaries.verdict: The Skullcandy Hesh 3 headphones deliver a strong audio experience with solid balance in a cool, understated design.
pros: Solid audio performance with rich lows and bright, well-defined highs
Earpads block out a substantial amount of ambient noise
cons: No inline remote on audio cable

customer_reviews.title: Very good over ear headphone
customer_reviews.text: I have slightly larger ears than the average person and these headphone fit over nicely without causing any discomfort. I have only worn them in the gym so far and they were fine on cycling, running and rowing! They connected straight away via bluetooth and the buttons are easy to use unlike some other headphones I have had. The sound quality was good and a decent amount of bass. The ‘cans’ are a lot slimmer than the hesh 2 which I preferred making them a lot less bulky. If I were to mark them down anywhere it would be that they feel a little lightweight/ plasticy- but I suppose it’s a trade off product weight v feeling cheap??!!
customer_reviews.author: l r g millman

customer_reviews.title: Great but must be better made.
customer_reviews.text: Sound great. Battery life amazing. Look cool and the controls and Bluetooth are great. Main problem is after using 5 days a week since Christmas 2018 the C shaped plastic section connecting the headphone to the headband broke. Seems to be a common issue experienced by other buyers. Otherwise they are great. Skullcandy need to take heed. Replace this section with metal. It'll make it a better product and improve reviews and customer satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Ok but expensive for ok headphones
customer_reviews.text: The connection is not great, when listening to music over bluetooth there is a crack every 20 seconds or so and the music skips a bit. This becomes very annoying after a while. The sound of a video conference from the computer is also very crackly and bad. And they are not very comfortable. I have relatively small ears but find them pressing into the cartiledge and hurting after a few hours. The only great thing about them is that the battery lasts a long time, they are versatile as they come with a cable too and they look nice. For £50 I'm very disappointed with the sound quality. I expected more from Skullcandy.
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, cheap plastic. Go with other models of same company.
customer_reviews.text: The way the earpiece themselfs are connected to the headband is of cheap plastic and broke in less than 2 weeks. Nothing againts the quality of the sound, I have another 2 crushers (not wireless) that work perfectly and are of quality built. But the durability of these ones is appalling
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Tinny sound and doesn't fit fully over ears
customer_reviews.text: They are bulkier than wanted, dont fit fully over ears which is annoying as my ear aches just after 30 mins use and I brought these for work and I will be wearing for 6 hours per day, the sound is quite tinny also compared to my Sony in ear ones, i cant comment on the battery life as havent been to work with them yet, all in all I'm quite disappointed, it was a gamble for me me these or a cheaper Sony ones, I wish I'd gone for the Sony now.
customer_reviews.author: fluffymel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I am HoH and I have really small ears so finding headphones/earbuds on a budget is a nightmare! My ears actually fit entirely in the middle bit of the earpieces so I don't get pain from wearing them too long, and they are definitely loud enough for me to be able to wear even in loud settings. The noise cancellation is not complete but it's high enough to dim distractions etc. so it's definitely worth it. Overall, these are entirely worth the price and probably the best you will get under £80
customer_reviews.author: Kitto

customer_reviews.title: Paying for the name!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are ok but you can get the same quality from cheaper headphones, like Mpow. After 12 months the plastic had broken in two places. I treat them carefully and keep them in a case, however this clearly wasn't enough to stop them from breaking. The audio quality is ok but it's nothing to write home about. All in all I do not think they are worth the money and are only priced high because of the name, not the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortably, high quality and excellent passive noise "cancellation"
customer_reviews.text: Whilst I don't like the term passive noise cancellation (because it does not cancel the sound, it just blocks it out), these headphones do it very well. Whilst it does not block sound out completely, I use them in my office and people find it hard to grab my attention when I do. These are over the ear headphones, so might not suit everyone, but it does result in the good sound damping and allow for plenty of cushioning. I'm not a sound expert, but I find these great.
customer_reviews.author: Wybird666

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality earphones
customer_reviews.text: The earphones are amazing..I didnt realise how good until I took them off in supermarket - noise cancellation is top notch. They sit comfortably on the ears...even with pierced ears. I wear 3 sets of hoops & find most headphones hurt due to this but not these. They fold away easily & are sturdy. This will be my go to brand from now on
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: These never die and they're so good
customer_reviews.text: I use them for everything. They're very comfortable, they fold nicely and the dials on the side are simple. The design overall is very clean and they never seem to die. I charge them and then use them on and off whilst on journeys or out skating and they're always ready to go when I need them. Too many Bluetooth headphones lack an aux but Skullcandy comes in swinging with one and these are too badly priced either.
customer_reviews.author: Visa

customer_reviews.title: Good all round headphones with good accessories
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. Colours are great to. I picked the dark olive green. They work really well. Easy to pair and they Sound good. My only gripe is the microphone, the voice quality is very good, but rather the lack of noise cancellation. Everyone can hear my voice really well, however, if there is noise in the background the microphone picks it all up.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C. Sfetsios

customer_reviews.title: Decent alternative to the Crusher
customer_reviews.text: After buying 2 different sets of the Crusher and having them snap - I was done with SC. However I decided to give these a chance as they are significantly cheaper and tbh the only thing that's missing is the extra bass slider (which is really unnecessary if I'm being honest). The quick charging is a real lifesaver too! Don't expect much noise cancellation - they spill like a mother
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Skullcandy Hesh 3
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my grandson. He is very impressed and so am I with the quality and presentation. They also seem to hold a charge for ages. And they look the part. 10 out of 10.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: very good pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: we usually just spend about 20 or 30 quid but find that you get what you pay for and sound quality is not good.. so good news - spend that little bit more money and you will have fab quality .. these are such a good make. My 14 year old son really loves them... a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: mh

customer_reviews.title: Headphones you can enter your own zone with
customer_reviews.text: Use these around the house and whilst out walking on my own or commuting. Sound quality is fantastic. Whilst not as the product states noise isolating, the feelings that you get around your ears from the strong clamp provided around your head from the over earcups and the headband (which can be adusted) gives me enough isolation from the noise around me. I love how the headphones allow me to enter my own zone and be alone with just my own thoughts and music. The battery life is brill with a wire option. Occassionaly I have issues when trying to connect to my phone (LG) via Bluetooth. Also a included protective case would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mr D G Carr

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Bought them on sale for £65, and I do not regret it, they are loud and bassy but still balanced and keep the mids in a good place, the high end does suffer a bit but these are low end headphones (sound tone not price) and the Bluetooth has an impressive range, you will not be disappointed, the only thing I would like changed is you can't change songs using the buttons in it.
customer_reviews.author: matt s.

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones!
customer_reviews.text: So far these headphones have been amazing! The sound is great; the highs and mids are very clear and the bass (although loud) is prominent without being overpowering. They charge up very quickly and from a full charge, I got 21 hours of playback time, which is amazing! These headphones are very light and comfortable, meaning I can happily wear them for hours without really noticing they are there.
customer_reviews.author: Alwin

customer_reviews.title: Average headphones, but right for the money
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are generally ok. I bought the grey version and they look pretty cheap... perhaps suggest black may be better looking. The sound quality is fine in general. The controls are easy to use although the volume buttons can't seem to lower subtly which is a bit annoying as I like to wear them when working and like them to be very low. This can be adjusted through the computer/audio device though. The Bluetooth connection is good and quick. The charging is also great and very impressive how long the battery lasts. For the money, I think they're as good as you can expect, but perhaps lacking in the build quality and the styling.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with excellent battery life
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both have these, excellent sound quality and as the gym music is rubbish we know it's perfect for sound cancellation too.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Heslop

customer_reviews.title: Improved my sex life
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the wife, I assume she's happy with them as she put them on and now ignores me. She can't quite get her head around not needing to shout at me when I'm next to her on the sofa as she uses them. Pretty sure the noise cancellation feature works as she was totally oblivious when I told her I'd shagged the neighbour whilst she used them, just a nod and a smile whilst she pretended to be listening to me.
customer_reviews.author: MR GA SNOOK

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I think I may just live in these. I had hesh 2 headphones for the last 2 years (they still function perfectly! I love skullcandy) and wanted to move on to something over the ear. I cannot believe how good these are for the price. I can't recommend these enough.
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Use these for my daily commute to and from work (25 minute walk) find very little issue with them and ever stand up to the rain we've been getting (I am not associated with Skull candy and do not claim they are/aren't meant to) have noticed when near a lot of people desynchronization will occasionally happen but I am extremely happy with my headphones and will consider getting my two oldest a set for Their birthday or Christmas present
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Good but be careful
customer_reviews.text: These are great sounding headphones and worth the money if you have it spare, however I found my self going through two pairs of these as the sides of them tend to break,and I’ve been particularly careful, I was using them for commuting to work and in the gym and just in the house as well. I have a set of HESH2 headphones and they have never been damaged and are a bit more sturdy. Just be careful where you take these and how you handle them.
customer_reviews.author: John Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Pointless Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Supposedly brand new, broken on arrival be wary. I purchased these headphones in good faith they'd be a cheaper alternative to some bigger noise cancelling headphones, in hindsight I regret the purchase. The headphones don't actually hold any charge whatsoever, they can only be used whilst on charge, which is aboslutely pointless. Be mindful when purchasing, not worth parting ways with nearly £50 to receive a piece of plastic that only works if it's plugged into a micro usb. Will be returning and steering clear of this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Break too easily
customer_reviews.text: I loved these headphones but unfortunately they break way too easily. When putting them on your head you stretch them out a little and the little arms supporting the headphones break. After a couple of months I was taping them up to make them stronger. A couple of weeks ago they totally snapped and they're now unusable. Absolutly gutted.
customer_reviews.author: Jennyfish442

customer_reviews.title: Arms broke
customer_reviews.text: They were great for the first few months, but too soon after purchase the arms around the ear cup broke. I may have a slightly larger than normal head, but it should be within tolerances for use with headphones. Not only that, but I don't even use them every day. I fixed it with superglue, but after another month it broke again. Another fix, but shortly after another arm broke. There are now visible cracks on all 4 arms of the headphone cups. Overall, the sound quality and connection is fine, but the build quality is so bad, with the plastic not able to stand day to day use.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Dawnay

customer_reviews.text: Quite happy with this purchase. I only bought these as I just wanted some decent Bluetooth headphones for the gym and these were on sale for 60 quid. Little bit bulky so you're not going to look too cool walking down the road but as I said I only bought them for the gym so I don't care. Sound quality is pretty decent for the price. They look great, no loud colours, nice and sleek finish. They feel great to wear, comfortable. Would be better if they came with a protective case as they feel like they could easily break if not looked after. Overall they're a good purchase in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Won't find better for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely more than I expected. The noise isolation is great, even better than my Sony active noise canceling. The sound is quite good for the price, I just wish I little bit less of bass. The material feels cheap and the buttons don't feel well to press. I'm happy with it over all. BTW the battery is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Broken  :(
customer_reviews.text: They've broken on both sides, less than 6 months old. I don't know who I complain to but surely headphones should last longer when they're only used for a few hours a week?
customer_reviews.author: KiJ

customer_reviews.title: really good product
customer_reviews.text: never really worn over the head earphones,but these are quite comfy,the sound is fantastic from them. i only use them for an hour or so a day,so a good overnight charge is all i need for the week
customer_reviews.author: skunkypants

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use these for a while before reviewing so I could give the best and most honest opinion, I can 100% say these are the best headphones I have ever used, I use these daily in the gym and on my daily 10k walks, the battery life is great the sound is good, possibly not loud enough but I am happy with the overall performance 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: vicki

customer_reviews.title: It's crushing my head
customer_reviews.text: At first the headphones where ok compared to the Skullcandy Crusher Wireless. The Hesh3 is not so comfortable, the build quality in the hand doesn't feel so great they're too light. After 30-60 minutes i felt the pressure on the ears, definitely not for long use. Overall i want my Crusher back.
customer_reviews.author: Spinti89

customer_reviews.title: seriously impressive
customer_reviews.text: simply the best headphones I've ever had. Comfy, easy Bluetooth connection. Awesome sound, and they look great. why pay £300+ (£200 is for the name/badge) when you can have these beauties for £80.
customer_reviews.author: MofoSixx

customer_reviews.title: Very workman like good quality headphones.
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I was hoping for. They have no noise cancelling but the padding that comfortably encased me ears stops noise leakage in or out. They produce a pretty true sound and aren't too bass heavy as a lot of popular headphones tend to be. They were dispatched and delivered in very quick time. I am glad that I bought a case too as I think they could be damaged if just slung into a bag on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Bindavies

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sound but very poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son and I would echo what many have written here - the build quality is poor which means the plastic hing on the headphones cracked. Returned and ordered second pair - the same thing. These were not cheap headphones and the sound is great but they are fragile that both pairs cracked in the same place. Need to find another make as two pairs of headphones in a year is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Nobby Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, comfortable. 2 pairs have snapped though.
customer_reviews.text: I've just had a second pair of the Hesh 3 break on me now, in exactly the same way (and others have posted pictures too). The plastic that connects the ears to the headband snap far too easily. Real shame - sound, comfort and battery life are great. But I won't be buying a 3rd pair.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Quality headphones but short life span!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use only while I worked. I work in 7 hours shifts and I had the these connected most of the time for about 7 months. I treated them very well. They always were either in their case or on my head... eventually after use they cracked on both sides just under the folding mechanism. I’m disappointed because I’ve had both the previous “hesh“ headphones and they haven’t let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Connor n.

customer_reviews.title: Great - Accept they break at a weak point and therefore last 6 months to a year if lucky!
customer_reviews.text: What a pity, they last a long time and sound great but have broken now on both hinge points and are unusable! Not the easiest location for glue either as it is close to the actually ear piece. I'll avoid Skull-candy again due to this, and although I'd read this issue existed in some reviews at the time, assumed as an adult a bit of care would help avoid the issue. They have been in a decent case and only used for work.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Higgleton

customer_reviews.text: Now that the headphones have worn in they are one of the best headphones I’ve owned for the price and better sound quality than the more expensive brands on the market.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: They good for te price about €60 - €70
customer_reviews.text: They good when they cost €60 My recomendation is add them to basket and watch teh price for week first they cost €100 next €75 then €68 I bought them and right now they cost €59 :-) So for than price they really good.
customer_reviews.author: Eamy

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them. Husband loves them. He said they are the best headphones he has used in ages!! So a happy customer indeed. Quality great price. Comfortable holds charge well
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Leighton-Trusk

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These fit comfortably. Sound great. I've fully charged them but don't know how long the charge will last. The instructions state this could be up to 22 hours. I've not used other over ear headphones so I've nothing to compare them with but I am satisfied with the purchase. Ive used them in the gym without issue
customer_reviews.author: Jason Marchant

customer_reviews.title: Very good  12th birthday present for our son
customer_reviews.text: Son wanted some headphones for his birthday in August and brother in law recommended these which our son seems very happy with after losing his iPhone ear bud things🙂
customer_reviews.author: Rosied78

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones. Unbelievable battery life. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing negative to say about these headphones. Great sound quality, unbelievable battery life and pretty loud too. Only negative is that they get a little uncomfortable after a while but I’m talking a few hours minimum. That probably won’t affect the average user. The highlight is definitely the battery life. I’ve had them for ages now and I think I’ve only charged them twice.
customer_reviews.author: Tam

customer_reviews.title: They make sweet music for my head
customer_reviews.text: Best sounding headphones I've ever had which isn't saying much if I'm honest but still I love em! So if you value a strangers opinion or you know me then yeah the sweet sound of your favourite tunes has never sounded so good.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. LDG

customer_reviews.title: No auto shutdown
customer_reviews.text: I like everything apart from no auto shutdown when not connected which means that if you forget to turn them off, the battery runs dry.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Carter

customer_reviews.title: Started off great. But then...
customer_reviews.text: At first. They were amazing. Then suddenly, one of the arms which hold the ear pod in place snapped. To make things worse, this happened whilst I was travelling abroad. To say I'm less than pleased would be putting it mildly. I even had to glue the arm back together to avoid any further damage (which of course, hasn't fixed the problem or even kept them together for very long).
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I used to have the Hesh 2 headphones but I upgraded. I really like these headphones, they are smaller and the fact you can fold them is great. The quality is amazing, and the battery life is excellent. They are really comfortable and amazing when I go running. The Bluetooth connection lasts quite a distance. Really pleased
customer_reviews.author: ems

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous Product !
customer_reviews.text: Battery life seems adequate. Quality a joke, cheap brittle plastic holding earcups to headband shattered into sharp jagged edges causing scarring to head. Insult being that I cant even get a refund as it happened a week after return date expired.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality plastic , easily breaks , Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality , plastic arms broke in two places with occasional and light use . Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Elias Elanjithara

customer_reviews.title: Highly impressive
customer_reviews.text: Very very long battery life, very impressive design and very portable. It would be better if they would come with a case. Volume up and down buttons are working seperately with phone's. Both wired and wireless, that's great.
customer_reviews.author: Ferhat

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I felt the product could do better on were the instructions. The booklet was very small and had the briefest instructions.(mainly pictures). Otherwise a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Sound Quality For A Brilliant Price
customer_reviews.text: I first got these headphones in the dark blue variant at Christmas last year. They were brilliant and lasted until about February when my brother broke them sadly. I then got the red ones this month and, even though they sound and perform the same, I think that they look amazing. If you're looking for some good cheap headphones, then you should definitely buy these!
customer_reviews.author: e

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product,good sound and very sturdy , packs away very easy, keep mine in box in came in.
customer_reviews.author: raymond w

customer_reviews.title: Best sound quality, best battery life and best for jogger/runners
customer_reviews.text: All I want to say is that it's worth every penney that I paid (specially since I got them on offer) and one thing I wish it had is the noise cancelling feature but it still cancels some noise. One more thing that I want to add, it's the best headphone for jogging because it never falls off your head (no matter how fast you jog/run).
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah Shir

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband and he simply loved them. He is a music freak so I believe his comments. Would but again at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This is the best headset I have ever used for that price range. The sound quality is outstanding, the pairing with Bluetooth is seamless and never suffers any cuts and the battery life is more than respectable.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. Great battery and sound. Marked down one star for durability as I felt they could feel a little more heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Tony W.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.text: These are so good. Comfortable and great sound quality. The noise cancellation is great and the battery just lasts and lasts. Can't recommend enough.
customer_reviews.author: Mr K

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying the Hesh 3's for a little over a month and i am amazed with the battery and sound quality. So far they have held up nicely but the folding mechanism feels looser than i would like. No other complaints. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aisling Best

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Product broke with a month could get a refuse as it was two week really disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: got one for me and liked so much that my husband got one for his sister as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Martishima

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Battery is great Sound is great Quality is great Al in all the headphones are...well...great
customer_reviews.author: Andy Warren

customer_reviews.title: Not that comfy if you wear glasses
customer_reviews.text: Sound ok. Battery life is good, bit uncomfortable after long periods if wearing glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Packman

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money with very good sound. Unfortunately they are too tight and cannot be adjuster.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and battery. Made out of paper
customer_reviews.text: I bought there in July (it is January now) and they started breaking up about 3 months ago, without heavy usage. Despite my efforts with superglue, the problem just never disappeared and they are broken now.
customer_reviews.author: vangelis

customer_reviews.title: Great Product :) and Spot on delivery :)
customer_reviews.text: The product looks great and sounds great. Thank you for delivering one day prior to the mentioned date. The only thing that makes me worry is the port. It looks slightly biased to a side, not sure if that's how it is supposed to look. Overall very happy with the product. Thank you for the on time delivery. :)
customer_reviews.author: Basith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Great quality, design and fit. As I expected. I loved it! The only I have to mention is that i didn't like at all that headphones came without a case so you can carry them out in your backpack or else...
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: There is no noise cancellation to my knowledge but these headphones will absolutely be good enough for even the most demanding user. Loved them, however it's probably better to push towards getting the 'skullcandy crushers' if you can get the extra money. These headphones were great though!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is amazzzzzzzing. Used regularly for a week without a need to charge. Loved the additional cable. Comfortable even with long term use. Love the sound Wished it came with a carrying case. Also band is a lot of plastic, looks quite fragile, although it has been holding up so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery life star with good sound
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones. The battery life is phenominal. They are a very comfortable adjustable fit. May not be the best sound to an audiophile but they blast others at a similar price point out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Brought these for my wife and she loves them. The battery last for a very long time between charges. The sound quality is amazing, so much so that I have brought a pair for myself now as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: Just what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: They seem a bit fragile but work and sound great. Would recommend. Perfect for travelling.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great Warranty Service
customer_reviews.text: Original set were a great product until sadly one of the arms broke that attach the can to the headband. I contacted Skullcandy warranty team and the service was excellent. No fuss, no bother just a code to be able to buy a replacement set. Would recommend on service alone.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Barraclough

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Impressed Thus Far
customer_reviews.text: Had these for a few weeks now and i'm enjoying them. Connect easily with multiple devices, and sit around my ears.
customer_reviews.author: VitalBearHealth

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these. He is very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Great Overall Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: To clarify my reviews, these do not noise cancel, but they do cut out some sound, an impressive amount for their price and what they are advertised as. Very comfortable and well-fitting, and the sound comes out well. Don't go for these if you want bass.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter - lovely sound quality. Good charge and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget_man

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely recommended
customer_reviews.text: Really good sound. Not the best material, but I like it. It's really comfortable, If you want to listen music for hours is not a problem. I love that I can use with cable if I need (playing with ps4). Battery life is great and the charging time is really fast
customer_reviews.author: Norbert

customer_reviews.title: Seems to have a design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pairs of these for my teenage boys. Both have broken at the brackets for the earpieces in exactly the same places on both ears.
customer_reviews.author: Doody

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit and good sound. Not complete noise cancellation but does drown out some background noise. Easy to connect with bluetooth. Only given 4 stars because there is no case with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Just as I expected, good quality product! Very happy with it! 100% recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Contour Ltd

customer_reviews.title: Skullcandy Hesh 3 Bluetooth Wireless Over-Ear Headphones with Microphone
customer_reviews.text: Easy connecting to Bluetooth devices ,battery last good and charges very fast
customer_reviews.author: AMIRAN

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Only had them a short time but love the sound quality and the comfortable fit. So far a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: MARK D WESTAWAY

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Connect button on headset a little difficult to find but minor detail
customer_reviews.author: Jill Day

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Been using them for college and the gym and had no problems. Battery life is great and they charge very fast which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Really good pair of headphones, a different style of music compared to the hesh 2 as these aren't as base heavy but focus more on the mid's and highs
customer_reviews.author: Adam H.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: The product is good quality sound wise but not durable
customer_reviews.author: tenusha

customer_reviews.title: Love them, good value for money and brilliant quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love them, if you are looking for a pair of decent headphones that you can actually afford and not have to re mortgaged the house for. I am very happy and been wearing them for a few hours each day.
customer_reviews.author: i got this for my birthday with my phone  and have had a few months and love it smart,keeps it safe

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable to wear and the charge lasts absolutely ages!
customer_reviews.author: Sarahhhh

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: I love it, these headphones are really good quality, however it is a bit delicate, so you have to be a clean user of these headphones, I advise on getting a cover case to protect it from accidental damages
customer_reviews.author: saurav

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pairs hesh2 and hesh3 as presents both happy with these easy set up sturdy headphones
customer_reviews.author: karen norton

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Incredible crisp sounds and a good bass to match. Multiple levels of volume meaning it's can be adjusted perfectly to your liking. Overall one of the best a fairly cheap Bluetooth headphones on the market
customer_reviews.author: Harry Styles

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much! They are so comfortable and the sound quality is outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: Gemma holt

customer_reviews.title: Broken in just a month of Use
customer_reviews.text: I have always hyped skull candy for their wonderful products, but i was ultimately disappointed. I have barely used this for a month and the plastic is crumbing.
customer_reviews.author: Chukwuma Onuegbu

customer_reviews.title: Really cool headphones!
customer_reviews.text: The design of these headphones is amazing! Sound is awesome and battery life super long! Definitely a solid headphone for under GBP 100
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Brought these as a replacement pair so knew they would be good. Super pleased with the delivery too arrived 3 days early
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality in general
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in time, comfortable to use for a full work day. Good sound quality, couple of friends of mine are getting them too. Microphone built in and jack connection is definitely a plus. Good for ps4 too
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Alcala

customer_reviews.title: Be gentle with them or they'll break
customer_reviews.text: Work well so far and help me because i dont like wearing in ear earphones
customer_reviews.author: Tobey lerone

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfy headphones
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit, great sound, battery life not the 18 hrs they reckoned though. Perfect for my morning commute
customer_reviews.author: Andy milford

product_meta.title: Skullcandy Hesh 3 Bluetooth Wireless Over-Ear Headphones with Microphone, Rapid Charge 22-Hour Battery, Foldable, Memory Foam Ear Cushions for Comfortable All-Day Fit, Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:BlackWith up to 22 hours of battery life and rapid charge technology, Hesh 3 wireless is designed to keep you listening all day long. A foldable design, high-end audio drivers, and quality materials make them the perfect over-ear headphone for any occasion. They are wireless perfection.

BOX CONTAINS
Skullcandy Hesh 3 Foldable Wireless Bluetooth Over-Ear Headphones with Microphone, 22-Hour Battery Life, & Memory Foam Ear Cushions (Black)
feature_bullets: All-Day Listening: Keep your soundtrack going with up to 22 hours of rechargeable battery. Just 10 minutes of charging offers 4 hours of play time, thanks to Rapid Charge technology, with a full battery reacharge in just 1 hour

All-Day Comfort: The pivoting armatures adjust for a perfect fit, while lightweight design and memory foam ear cushions allow for comfortable all day listening. It also allows them to lay flat on a table or around the neck when not in use
Premium Sound: For big sound no matter what you listen to, an integrated analog amplifier pushes a pair of high-quality 40mm audio drivers that give your music the rich, dynamic sound it deserves
Easy To Use: Voice notifications assist in pairing your device. Take calls, change tracks, and adjust volume with the built-in controls and microphone

Back-Up Aux Cable: If you've transcended the need to sleep and your 22-hour battery needs charging or you have a device that requires a corded connection, just plug in the included AUX cord with microphone and remote and never miss a beat

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
